page.title: 10WELSH ST DONATS_SHOPPING
page.content: The shopping pattern of the village is varied. For small items such as newspapers 11 people buy them in Cowbridge, 3 people buy them in Cardiff, 2 people buy them in Pontyclun and nobody buys them in Bridgend or Talbot Green. For weekly shopping 5 people shop in Cardiff and Cowbridge, 2 people shop in Pontyclun, 1 person shops in Talbot Green. Nobody shops in Bridgend. For long term food shopping the inhabitants are divided between 4 people buying it in Cardiff and Cowbridge, 2 people in Pontyclun, 1 person in Talbot Green and nobody in Bridgend. For articles of clothing and footwear, Cardiff is the most popular and Cowbridge less popular. {cont. P.11.}
